title: Export action. no. 39
brief_description: Part of a series encouraging Australian manufactures to pursue export markets. Examines the case of a West Australian pyjama manufacturer who, with government assistance, broke into the Malaysian and Singaporean pyjama markets.
description: Part of a series encouraging Australian manufactures to pursue export markets. Examines the case of a West Australian pyjama manufacturer who, with government assistance, broke into the Malaysian and Singaporean pyjama markets.
